description: Base StructureDefinition for instant Type: An instant in time - known at least to the second

element.comment: Note: This is intended for where precisely observed times are required, typically system logs etc., and not human-reported times - for them, see date and dateTime (which can be as precise as instant, but is not required to be) below. UTC offset is always required
element.definition: An instant in time - known at least to the second
